textArr:
The Waterfalls of Negri Sembilan is a hilly State. Large part of it occupied by the Main Range and some other rolling hills toward the coast. 
Most waterfalls are found on the western slopes of the Main Range. There are also a few in the rolling hills or isolated outcrops.
   
   


	   Accessability: Easy

	  Jeram GlamiNear Titi Town, Jelebu
	  Cascades
	  Trekking
	  A low height wide river cascade. Interesting spot to visit once recovered from flood devastation.Last update February 2022
	 
	  
	  Jeram LambarNear Seremban
	  CascadesSingle fall
	  PicnicSwimmingTrekking
	  Small slopped falls with a pool in oil palm estate backyardLast update March 2022

	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  SwimmingTrekking
	  A quiet and forgotten falls 1st documented and published in WoM BookLast update July 2022
	 
	  
	  Lata Berembun (Closed)Pantai town
	  CascadesMultiple falls
	  PicnicSwimmingTrekking
	  Flood damage during the Dec 2021 has severely effected the area and entrance access.Last update September 2018
	 
	  
	  Lata KijangKg Esok
	  Single fall
	  TrekkingCamping
	  Access has become easier recently. Possibly the tallest fall in the western part of Peninsular Malaysia
Last update May 2008
